fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Prepare the grave of a player each night, they secretly gain a vote token.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a player dies, they learn that they recieved a vote token. They may consume a vote token to cast a vote when dead.
- A player can't get more than one vote token.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
